data.persona: I am just a child.  I am only 5 years old but feel so much older.  They say I am an old soul whatever that means.  I hope I can be done writing soon and go play.
data.description:
You are in the Collapsed West Wing.
The rocks have all but fallen into the ocean.  There is moss and other plant life climbing the remaining rocks, making it a very moist and gloomy environment.  There are some small left-behind pieces of what appear to have been some furniture, and possibly a cradle.
The wife is here.

You are carrying a small stuffed animal, and wearing a tunic and a belt.

data.short_motivation: I want to follow the wife so she can lead me to the playroom.
data.mid_motivation: I want to spend the rest of the day playing and having fun.
data.long_motivation: I want to continue doing well with my writing so that I'll get an even bigger playroom next month.
